tag_list: vintage, jewelry, fashion, clothing, ning, antique, decor, blog, shop
overview: Linda Caricofe is the owner of RC Antiques. Her on line shop , is on Ruby Lane . There is also RCantiques.com web page that gives the links to all of her activites. Linda Caricofe is also a video producer. She writes her own scripts, and produces her videos that she also hosts. Of special note is Linda’s Shop Talk on Ruby Lane , a video that gives tips on how to have a successful shop on line. Linda was writing on line about fashion and home decor for the local on line Examiner, however, at this time, she has not written anything for the examiner due to too many other on line activites. She is now semi retired and enjoys creating styleboards on Polyvore Polyvore has become her hobby…her sets are popular due to their artistic nature. Her art and fantasy sets on Polyvore are popular because she is a writer and writes a story or poem specifically for the set she creates. Collector and shop owner of vintage luxury , such as vintage costume jewelry, vintage fashion and accesories, and vintage home decor. Also a blogger of treasure hunting. Posting road signs to fabulous sites on line , blogs of memories of antique dealers and shops, and blogs of personal collections. Linda Caricofe also collects on line friends. Thanks to FaceBook , Google + and other on line social networks, such as The Vintage Village, Linda has discovered friends all over the world. Linda Caricofe also promotes items she believes in, free Good solid advice cannot be brought , instead, just ask Linda, if she does not know the answer, she will find someone else to answer your question for you.
